Here Beautiful! Glow Serum With Plant Derived Squalane

Brand: Here Beautiful!

Category: Serums & Essences

Ingredients: PURIFIED WATER (AQUA), GLYCERETH-26, PROPYLENE GLYCOL, PLANT DERIVED SQUALANE, GLYCERIN, HYDROXYETHYLCELLULOSE, CARBOMER, POLYSORBATE 20, AMINOMETHYL PROPANOL, PHENOXYETHANOL, DEHYDROACETIC ACID, BENZYL ALCOHOL.
